Why write a review?

  • Help other customers find trustworthy businesses and make good decisions.
  • To reward a company that has done right by you.
  • Giving public feedback is the best way to get companies to listen
  • To help companies make improvements in their products and services.
  • People reply on consumer reviews and posting reviews is a way of giving back.

Why write a strain review?

  • Help other patients find trustworthy strains and get a sense of how a particular strain might help them.
  • A great way to share information, contribute to collective knowledge and giving back to the cannabis community.
  • A great review should include flavor, aroma, effect, and helpful health ailments.

Blue Dream Marijuana Strain

4.5
4.5
432 votes| 296 reviews
Write a Review Favorite Strain Unfavorite Strain
Strain Information

Sativa Dominant Hybrid - 60% Sativa / 40% Indica

THC: 17% - 24%, CBD: 2%, CBN: 1%

Blue Dream is a slightly sativa dominant hybrid (60% sativa/40% indica) strain that is a potent cross between the hugely popular BlueberryX Haze strains. This infamous bud boasts a moderately high THC level that ranges from 17-24% on average and a myriad of both indica and sativa effects. Users describe the Blue Dream high as having an immediate onset of an uplifting cerebral head high that leaves you completely motivated and focused with waves of creative energy that hit quickly and hard. This is accompanied by a mellow relaxing body high that leaves you warmed, numb, and completely pain free. Due to these potent combination effects, Blue Dream is said to be an ideal strain for treating patients suffering from conditions such as chronic stress, chronic pain due to injury or illness, mild to moderate cases of depression, and sleep disorders, including insomnia. Blue Dream has a delicious aroma of sweet blueberry pie and a taste of sugary sweet blueberries that stays on your tongue long after smoking. This bud has large dense yet fluffy popcorn-shaped bright neon green nugs with amber and blue hairs and rich blue undertones. These nugs are dusted with a fine layer of sandy milky white trichomes and sweet sticky resin.

Consumption Method: PipesEffects I Feel: Calming, Chronic Pain, Long LastingHelp Me With: Parkinson's
Posted  Sept. 26, 2025, 4:17 a.m.| Show detailsHide details

After much research and trials with many strains that are reported to help with chronic pain, I tried this one. I have to say I am not a big smoker or vaper, but when the pain is very bad I take a hit or two of this as I take my Gummies. This gives me an uplift as well as the beginning of some pain relief. Most people that have chronic pain are a little bit grumpy and irritable at times, I found this to blow away the 20 other strains I have tried previously. At first, it's a little tingly and it puts a smile on my face, as it gently melts away some of that chronic pain. Although it is 60% sativa, it does not wire me out as other sativa's do, and it allows me to continue with whatever work I was doing before my episode. At the same time it is relaxing, calming and yet a bit energizing, or should I say more so, motivating with a touch of creativity. The taste and aroma are pleasant with a blueberry touch. I hope this helps with your selection. As a sidenote, I cannot give the Columbia Care (Cannabist) in Logan Ohio any higher praise than given in the past. They continue to be professional, informative, friendly, respectful, and just good people. If you're ever around Hocking Hills Ohio stop in and take advantage of their sales and wide variety of product.

Consumption Method: Vape PensEffects I Feel: Calming, Chronic Pain, UpliftingHelp Me With: Anxiety, Arthritis, Chronic PainAromas: Blueberry, MellowFlavors: Blueberry, Mellow
cowgirlinmytime   - Posted  July 27, 2025, 1:21 p.m.| Show detailsHide details

Energising yet calming

Consumption Method: BongEffects I Feel: Calming, Energizing, MotivationHelp Me With: Depression, Fatigue

The high creeps up and suddenly hits you like a freight train. But the taste is absolutely unforgettable. And I highly recommend it to anyone.
